definitions.definition: The quality of dealing with ideas rather than events.
definitions.example: topics will vary in degrees of abstraction

definitions.definition: Freedom from representational qualities in art.
definitions.example: geometric abstraction has been a mainstay in her work

definitions.definition: The process of considering something independently of its associations, attributes, or concrete accompaniments.
definitions.example: duty is no longer determined in abstraction from the consequences

definitions.definition: The process of removing something, especially water from a river or other source.
definitions.example: the abstraction of water from springs and wells
